summary: While on the run in the mountains from the authorities, a poor peasant tries to save a widow of the WWII soldier from an arranged marriage.
cast: Shaarbek Kobaganov|A. Abayeva|Baken Kydykeyeva|Muratbek Ryskulov|Bolot Beyshenaliev|Vladimir Zharikov|K. Rysmendiyeva|Sovetbek Dzhumadylov|A. Aytaliev|Rudolf Pankov|Tolomush Okeev|Vladimir Kostin|Lyudmila Bezuglaya|Lyudmila Chupiro|Nikolay Gavrilov|Georgy Satini|Igor Efimov|Vera Titova|Yevgeny Barkov|Pavel Kashlakov|Aleksandr Stepanov
title: Belyie gory
